actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing as a Senate document of a revised edition of the "Biographical Directory of the American Congress".

summary.text: Authorizes the printing as a Senate document of a revised edition of the "Biographical Directory of the American Congress." Directs the printing of 3,500 additional copies of which 1,000 copies shall be for the use of the Senate, 2,200 copies for the House of Representatives, and 300 copies for the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing as a Senate document of a revised edition of the "Biographical Directory of the American Congress".
